text.section:
The commissioner shall collect and pay into the State Treasury the following fees relative to assessment or cooperative fire insurance companies:
For filing a copy of articles of incorporation of the company, $10;
For filing annual statement of the company, $10; and
For filing papers and keeping records on change of territory, $5.

No other charges than those provided in this section shall be made against assessment or cooperative fire insurance companies by the Department of Insurance unless agreed to by the respective companies.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 901, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 14, effective September 1, 1950.
